# Introduction to the dataset

# Is the dataset tidy?

## Loading of dataset

```{r}
rm(list = ls())
library(curl)
library(tidyverse)
protein_data <- read_csv("../_raw/77_cancer_proteomes_CPTAC_itraq.csv")
clinical_data <- read_csv("../_raw/clinical_data_breast_cancer.csv") 
PAM50_file <- read_csv("../_raw/PAM50_proteins.csv")
```

```{r}
write_tsv(protein_data, "../data/protein_load.tsv")

write_tsv(clinical_data, "../data/clinical_load.tsv")

write_tsv(PAM50_file, "../data/PAM50_load.tsv")
```
